extension.title: Subforums
extension.description:
Add multilevel subforums.
Options in Administration » Settings » Features.
extension.author: Sergey Leschina
extension.note: Warning: this version is not stable and has "alpha" status. Do not use it on active projects!

hooks.hook: // Hide subforums $query['WHERE'] = '('.$query['WHERE'].') AND f.parent_id=0';
// Get info about parent $query['SELECT'] .= ', f.parent_id';
$query['INSERT'] .= ', parent_id'; $query['VALUES'] .= ', '.$subforums_parent_id;
if (isset($parent_id)) $query['WHERE'] = '1=0';
$form['show_subforums_list'] = (isset($_POST['form']['show_subforums_list'])) ? intval($_POST['form']['show_subforums_list']) : 0;
$query['INSERT'] .= ', show_subforums_list'; $query['VALUES'] .= ', '. $forum_config['o_subforums_show_list'];
$query['WHERE'] = 't.forum_id IN ('.implode(', ', $subforums_tree).') AND t.moved_to is NULL';
